strapiPost.title: FORMAT 2023 Coming To Bentonville This September
strapiPost.content:
FORMAT returns Sept 22-24 for the second edition of Northwest Arkansas’s three-day celebration of music, art, and technology, featuring 60+ performances from artists like Alanis Morissette, LCD Soundsystem, Leon Bridges, Modest Mouse, Jamie xx, Little Simz, Bob Moses, and many more. 

  • Creative space: Talented artists from around the world, including JR’s Inside Out Project and Kameelah Janan Rasheed, will create incredible art experiences for attendees to explore throughout the festival’s unconventional venues, including The Cube, The Hangar, and the Bizarre Bazaar. 
  • World of Oz: Set in the beautiful Ozarks, affectionately known locally as the World of Oz, festival-goers will experience Northwest Arkansas’s unparalleled access to outdoor recreation, art, and culture, such as the Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art and world-renowned mountain biking trails. 

Tickets are on sale now, starting at $20 down with a layaway plan, HERE.
